title: Fort Donelson National Battlefield: News
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     News             News        The news of the battle spread far and wide... Park Staff       Fort Donelson National Battlefield and the National Park Service make every effort to keep the public informed about news events, accomplishments, special and re-occurring events which occur within the park. Fort Donelson National Battlefield provides press releases to local and regional newspapers, and also posts current news releases on its web site.         You can follow us on Facebook! All you have to do is click here. We'll keep you updated on what's happening in the park.
